targets.rawSql: SELECT power_normal_kwh FROM power ORDER BY "time" DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT power_offpeak_kwh FROM power ORDER BY "time" DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT water_m3 FROM water ORDER BY "time" DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT heath_gj FROM heath ORDER BY "time" DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT "time" FROM water ORDER BY "time" DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT "time", power_offpeak_kwh, power_normal_kwh FROM power_hour_usage WHERE $__timeFilter("time") ORDER BY "time" ASC
SELECT $__timeGroup("time", '1d'), SUM(power_normal_kwh) as normal, SUM(power_offpeak_kwh) as offpeak FROM power_hour_usage WHERE $__timeFilter("time") GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1 ASC
SELECT time, 1000*water_m3 as water FROM water_hour_usage WHERE $__timeFilter(time) ORDER BY "time" ASC
SELECT $__timeGroup(time, '1d') as time, 1000*sum(water_m3) as water_m3 FROM water_hour_usage WHERE $__timeFilter(time) group by 1 order by 1
SELECT "time", delta_gj FROM heath WHERE $__timeFilter("time") ORDER BY "time" ASC LIMIT null
SELECT $__timeGroup(time, '1d') as time, sum(delta_gj) as delta_gj FROM heath WHERE $__timeFilter(time) group by 1 order by 1
SELECT $__timeGroup("time", '1d'), max(power_offpeak_kwh) FROM power WHERE $__timeFilter("time") group by 1 ORDER BY "time" ASC
SELECT $__timeGroup("time", '1d'), max(power_normal_kwh) FROM power WHERE $__timeFilter("time") group by 1 ORDER BY "time" ASC
SELECT $__timeGroup("time", '1d'), max(water_m3) FROM water WHERE $__timeFilter("time") group by 1 ORDER BY "time" ASC
SELECT $__timeGroup(time,'1d') as time, max(heath_gj) FROM heath WHERE $__timeFilter(time) group by 1 order by 1
